body:
# Zincir 

Simple distributed blockchain experiment written in [Crystal](https://crystal-lang.org)

## Usage

### Install shards

```bash
$ shards install
$ shards build
  Dependencies are satisfied
  Building: zincir
  Building: zincird
$ ./bin/zincird --help
  Usage: zincir [arguments]
      -s IP, --seed-ip=IP              Specify ip for the seed node
      -i IP, --host-ip=IP              Specify ip for the host node
      -p PORT, --port=PORT             Start public server for other nodes to connect
      -l, --local-net                  Prevents initial seed node connections
      -w, --web                        Enable web server
      -m, --mine                       Enable mining
      -h, --help                       Show this help
      -v, --version                    Show version
```

### Start a private node

```bash
$ ./bin/zincird --mine
  Connecting to testnet.zincir.xyz:9147
  Added <1-0878bff02..ec7> 1544946023
  ...
```

### Start a public node

```bash
$ ./bin/zincird --ip mynode.mywebsite.com --port 1234 --mine
  Connecting to testnet.zincir.xyz:9147
  Added <1-0878bff02..ec7> 1544946023
  ...
```

class_methods.name: calculate_hash
class_methods.doc: Returns the hash of the `Block` with the given *nonce*
class_methods.summary: Returns the hash of the Block with the given nonce

def.name: calculate_hash
def.body:
hash = OpenSSL::Digest.new("SHA256")
hash.update((((nonce + index) + timestamp) + data) + previous_hash)
hash.hexdigest

def.name: solve_block
def.body:
loop do
  hash = calculate_hash(nonce)
  if Difficulty.satisfies?(hash, difficulty)
    return {nonce, hash}
  end
  nonce = nonce + 1
  Fiber.yield
end

def.name: to_json
def.body:
json.object do
  _index = @index
  if _index.nil?
  else
    json.field("index") do
      _index.to_json(json)
    end
  end
  _timestamp = @timestamp
  if _timestamp.nil?
  else
    json.field("timestamp") do
      _timestamp.to_json(json)
    end
  end
  _data = @data
  if _data.nil?
  else
    json.field("data") do
      _data.to_json(json)
    end
  end
  _previous_hash = @previous_hash
  if _previous_hash.nil?
  else
    json.field("previous_hash") do
      _previous_hash.to_json(json)
    end
  end
  _difficulty = @difficulty
  if _difficulty.nil?
  else
    json.field("difficulty") do
      _difficulty.to_json(json)
    end
  end
  _nonce = @nonce
  if _nonce.nil?
  else
    json.field("nonce") do
      _nonce.to_json(json)
    end
  end
  _hash = @hash
  if _hash.nil?
  else
    json.field("hash") do
      _hash.to_json(json)
    end
  end
end

def.name: next_difficulty
def.body:
if last.index == (UPDATE_FREQUENCY - 1)
  return last.difficulty
end
if (next_index % UPDATE_FREQUENCY) > 0
  return last.difficulty
end
first = block_at((last.index - UPDATE_FREQUENCY) + 1)
duration = last.timestamp - first.timestamp
desired_duration = (BLOCK_DURATION * (UPDATE_FREQUENCY - 1))
Difficulty.calculate(last.difficulty, duration, desired_duration)

def.name: queue_block
def.body:
begin
  @queued_blocks << block
  while !@queued_blocks.empty?
    first_block = @queued_blocks.sort_by!(&.index).shift
    add_block(first_block)
  end
rescue BlockIndexTooHigh
  @queued_blocks << first_block.not_nil!
end

def.name: run!
def.body:
options = Options.new
OptionParser.parse(args) do |parser|
  parser.banner = "Usage: zincir [arguments]"
  parser.on("-s IP", "--seed-ip=IP", "Specify ip for the seed node") do |i|
    options.seed_ip = i
  end
  parser.on("-i IP", "--host-ip=IP", "Specify ip for the host node") do |i|
    options.host_ip = i
  end
  parser.on("-p PORT", "--port=PORT", "Start public server for other nodes to connect") do |i|
    options.port = i.to_i
  end
  parser.on("-l", "--local-net", "Prevents initial seed node connections") do |i|
    options.local = true
  end
  parser.on("-w", "--web", "Enable web server ") do |i|
    options.web = true
  end
  parser.on("-m", "--mine", "Enable mining") do
    options.mine = true
  end
  parser.on("-h", "--help", "Show this help") do
    puts(parser)
    exit
  end
  parser.on("-v", "--version", "Show version") do
    puts("Zincir v#{VERSION}-crystal")
    exit(0)
  end
end
run!(options)

def.name: run!
def.body:
blockchain = Blockchain.new
seed_ip = options.local? ? nil : options.seed_ip
network = Network.new(seed_ip)
Storage::File.load_and_sync(blockchain)
Storage::Network.load_and_sync(blockchain, network)
if (options.web? || options.port) || options.host_ip
  spawn(Web.start!(network, blockchain, options.port, options.host_ip))
end
if options.mine?
  spawn(Miner.start!(blockchain))
end
sleep

if ratio > 1.1 || ratio < 0.9
  multiply(current_difficulty, ratio)
else

end

def.name: start!
def.body:
new_block_channel = Channel(Bool).new
blockchain.on(:block) do |block|
  new_block_channel.send(true)
end
index_changed = false
spawn do
  loop do
    index_changed = new_block_channel.receive
  end
end
loop do
  begin
    last_block = blockchain.last
    difficulty = blockchain.next_difficulty
    index = blockchain.next_index.to_s
    data = "Transaction Data... #{Random.rand(100)}"
    timestamp = Time.now.to_unix.to_s
    nonce = -1
    index_changed = false
    loop do
      nonce = nonce + 1
      hash = Block.calculate_hash(nonce.to_s, index, timestamp, data, last_block.hash)
      if Difficulty.satisfies?(hash, difficulty)
        break
      end
      if index_changed
        break
      end
      Fiber.yield
    end
    if index_changed
      next
    end
    block = Block.new(index.to_i, timestamp.to_i64, data, last_block.hash, difficulty, nonce)
    blockchain.queue_block(block)
  rescue Blockchain::BlockNotAdded
  end
end

def.name: load_and_sync
def.body:
if ::File.exists?(".blocks")
else
  Dir.mkdir(".blocks")
end
blockchain.on(:block) do |block|
  ::File.write(".blocks/#{block.hash}", block.to_json)
end
(Dir.open(".blocks/")).each_child do |filename|
  begin
    file = ::File.read(".blocks/#{filename}")
    block = Block.from_json(file)
    blockchain.queue_block(block)
  rescue Blockchain::BlockNotAdded
    ::File.delete(".blocks/#{block.hash}")
    puts("Filesystem block is disregarded, deleting file..")
    next
  end
end
puts("Finished reading the chain from file system")

def.name: load_and_sync
def.body:
network.on(:block) do |block|
  blockchain.queue_block(block)
end
blockchain.on(:block) do |block|
  if block.mined_by_us?
    network.broadcast_block(block)
  end
end
if network.public_nodes.empty?
  puts("Can't download or broadcast to network, no public nodes")
  return
end
network_last_block = network.last_block
if blockchain.last.index < network_last_block.index
  download(blockchain, network)
else
  broadcast(blockchain, network, network_last_block.index)
end

def.name: start!
def.body:
logging(false)
before_all do |env|
  env.response.headers.add("Access-Control-Allow-Origin", "*")
end
get("/nodes") do
  network.public_nodes.map(&.ip).to_json
end
get("/blocks") do
  blockchain.last.to_json
end
get("/blocks/:index") do |env|
  index = env.params.url["index"].to_i
  (blockchain.block_at(index)).to_json
end
ws("/blocks") do |socket, env|
  network.add_node(socket)
end
port || (port = DEFAULT_PORT)
if ip
  puts("Starting & broadcasting web server at #{ip}:#{port}")
  network.broadcast_host_ip("#{ip}:#{port}")
else
  ip = DEFAULT_IP
  puts("Starting local web server at #{ip}:#{port}")
end
Kemal.run(port)
